alert.note: Alert for Hancock; McDonough (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 25 at 10:07AM CDT until March 28 at 3:40AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Illinois... La Moine River at Colmar affecting Hancock and McDonough Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...La Moine River at Colmar. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Water affects the lowest portions of Lambert Road and affects Lamar Road approximately 100 feet north of the intersection with County Road 26. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 12.2 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/quadcities. The next statement will be issued this evening.
